## foundationAgTextFieldRenderer() function

A function that returns a Foundation Text Field Renderer registration for configuring the component with a DesignSystem.

**Signature:**

```typescript
foundationAgTextFieldRenderer: (overrideDefinition?: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").OverrideFoundationElementDefinition<{
    baseName: string;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<AgTextFieldRenderer, any>;
}>) => import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementRegistry<{
    baseName: string;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<AgTextFieldRenderer, any>;
}, typeof AgTextFieldRenderer>
```
